title: Clownfish Tales
author: Fin Katherine
pages: Clownfish, them bright lil' critters skitter through reef corals with grace.
Don't let their size fool ye; their vibrant colors protect 'em from marauding predators.
They're rare in the wild, a real find for aquatics who like an aquarium with flair.
Catchin' 'em be more of a delight for the eye than the belly; they offer naught to sate hunger.
A fair catch for aquarists lookin' to add a splash of color to their collection.
